scripts.deploy: set -u && STAGE='staging' HOST='https://staging.raise-newstart.com' SALT='abcdefg' SENDGRID_API_KEY=$SENDGRID_API_KEY DOCSAWAY_EMAIL=$DOCSAWAY_EMAIL DOCSAWAY_KEY=$DOCSAWAY_KEY DATABASE_URL=$FRAUDSTOP_DB_URL ./node_modules/.bin/sls deploy -f fraudstop-func
scripts.deployprod: set -u && STAGE='prod' HOST='https://raise-newstart.com' LETTER_LAMBDA='fraudstop-prod-letter-func' SALT=$FRAUDSTOP_PROD_SALT SENDGRID_API_KEY=$SENDGRID_API_KEY DOCSAWAY_EMAIL=$DOCSAWAY_EMAIL DOCSAWAY_KEY=$DOCSAWAY_KEY DATABASE_URL=$FRAUDSTOP_PROD_DB_URL ./node_modules/.bin/sls deploy -f fraudstop-func --stage prod
